title: Who will win Worlds???
body: Just a question to anyone who reads this.  Who do you think will win Worlds 2016.

replies.body: Out of the quarters SKT, ROX, H2K and SSG should advance to semis. Once in semis I think SKT and SSG will progress to the finals where SKT should win out over SSG 3-1
Yea I agree with this. Should be a 3rd set of SKT World Champ skins coming our way

C9 C9 C9 ! A man can dream =D

I just hope its not Korea vs Korea finals.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=UALUYWEg,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-12T08:52:55.060+0000)
>
> C9 C9 C9 ! A man can dream =D
> 
> I just hope its not Korea vs Korea finals.

IKR!!!! If it's C9 vs Skt I'm throwing a party just to watch worlds.


EDIT: Well I just looked it up c9 got there asses handed to them by ssg rip our dream marauder
Rip the dream. theres always next year =D
not if Immortals get any say in things
C9?! Come on, man. You're supposed to be a Rioter and in the know. There are three Korean teams. C9 doesn't have a snowflake's chance in hell.
I got my tier 3 C9 icon on day 1 of worlds. Just repping my hopes and dreams =D

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=UALUYWEg,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-12T08:52:55.060+0000)
>
> C9 C9 C9 ! A man can dream =D
> 
> I just hope its not Korea vs Korea finals.

The dream is gonna stay a dream bro.
SKT is gonna win, and we all know it.

C9 = My heart wants them 2 win.
SKTelecom 1 = I KNOW they're gonna win.
Given how the brackets turned out, probably Samsung. They can more than likely coast to the final which is a good and bad thing but I think more good
C9 FOR SURE.. Haha, I came for the memes and now they're my favorite team, what commitment
if its not a korea vs korea finals than it will probs be 3.0
If anyone wants to play some games private message me on LOL.  Send a friend request.  Thanks and go ROX Tigers
